title: How to design a pcb and get it manufactured - Quora

response.answer_text: You need to find the requirements of the circuit diagram. For example, the input power source, output voltage, output current. These factors depend on the load, that is the device for which you are designing the charger. Once you get acquainted with these parameters, design the circuit diagram or search on the internet as per your requirements. Once you are ready with the circuit diagram, you can proceed with PCB designing process yourself at home. I’ve written this entire process in the following answer: Prathamesh Satardekar's answer to How do I print a single layer pcb at home?
Hello, For EAGLE there´s a guided tour on the website: Eagle | Tour, you could also check the FAQ area or the manuals. You could read some books about your favorite software likewise. Best regards
